item.description:
Second Norton's Weight Loss Challenge



Next Weightloss Challenge will be starting on Wednesday, August 27 at the De Vincent's Downtown Cafe, 292 West Main St. Norton, MA. It will be held every Wednesdays for 12 classes, starting on August 27 and with last class on November 12.

For more information, contact Helene Smith, (508) 942-6326 and/ or to pre-register.

group.name: The Attleboro Weight Loss Challenge Meetup

item.name: Second Norton's Weight Loss Challenge
